keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats would raise the threshold at which people on low incomes will no longer have to pay any income tax at all.
Liberal Democrats will restore the link between annual increases in the state pension and earnings that will mean pensioners share in the proceeds of growth in our economy.

housing.content: Stop the proportion of affordable housing in our Borough from falling.

contactInformation.address: FREEPOST RSAZ-SHUG-KAEA, PO Box 55933, London, W11 2XX

images.caption: Lib Dem tax cut backed by top experts
